subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United won the Community Shield yesterday, capturing the traditional season opener by beating Chelsea, 3-0, in a shootout. Goalie Edwin van der Sar saved all three penalty kicks he faced.
snippet: Manchester United won the Community Shield yesterday, capturing the traditional season opener by beating Chelsea, 3-0, in a shootout. Goalie Edwin van der Sar saved all three penalty kicks he faced.
